Around 1,000 people scaled the walls on the museum's eastern side on Friday, according to Zahi Hawass , secretary general of the Supreme Council of Antiquities. They went into the Late Period gallery, but when they found no gold, they broke thirteen vitrines and threw the antiquities on the floor, Zahi Hawass said on his blog. As women voters in Indiana learn that one of Rep. Mike Pence 's top legislative priorities is effectively denying access to preventive care for millions of women, he will have difficulty winning their vote, Cecile Richards , the fund's president, said in a statement.
